changeSet.author: Nomokonov Vladimir
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE fromexcel ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name varchar, inv_number varchar, quantity integer, unit varchar, price numeric, type_TMC varchar, type_utilize varchar, code_group varchar, name_group varchar, MOL varchar, code_department varchar, name_department varchar, locations varchar, non_system boolean, date_creation date, date_postings date, date_exploit date, date_closin date, old_inv_number varchar );
